sentences.en: By the way, did we have an English class last Friday, Lily?
sentences.cn: 顺便问一句, 莉莉, 上星期五我们上英语课了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Comment upon this would be to paint the lily.
sentences.cn: 对此发表评论无异于画蛇添足.

sentences.en: I am the rose of Sharon, and the lily of the valleys.
sentences.cn: 我是沙仑的玫瑰花（或作水仙花），是谷中的百合花。

sentences.en: I rode to Lily's in a cab.
sentences.cn: 我乘出租车去了莉莉家。

sentences.en: Lily lives in a penthouse just off Park Avenue.
sentences.cn: 莉莉住在公园大道附近的一套顶层豪华公寓里。

sentences.en: Lily said to herself that the mask just drop.
sentences.cn: 丽莉心中说道,现在面具该摘下来了.

sentences.en: Lily was duly impressed by the magnitude of her opportunities.
sentences.cn: 选择良偶的重要性丽莉早已深深地铭刻在心.

sentences.en: Lily was in one of her aggressive moods.
Look here, Lily, don't take that high and mighty tone with me.
sentences.cn: 你听着, 丽莉! 别跟我摆架子!

sentences.en: Look, the water lily is folding its petals.
sentences.cn: 看, 莲花在合拢花瓣了.

sentences.en: She is as fair as lily.
Steve seems to have made a real conquest of Lily. They're always together.
sentences.cn: 史蒂夫好像真的赢得了莉莉的芳心. 他们总是在一起.

sentences.en: The dress is perfect. Don't add anything to it at all. It would just be gilding the lily.
sentences.cn: 这条裙子已经很完美了, 别再作任何修饰了, 那只会画蛇添足.

sentences.en: They want me to conform, to be lily-white.
sentences.cn: 他们要我循规蹈矩，要我清白无瑕。

sentences.en: We sat in Lily's sunroom while I sketched in the situation.
sentences.cn: 我们坐在莉莉的日光浴室里，我把目前形势的细节情况又补充说明了一下。

trans.tran_cn: 百合花，纯洁的人，[女名]莉莉
trans.tran_en: one of several types of plant with large bell-shaped flowers of various colours, especially white
